title: Is there a difference between advanced and developed countries? - Quora

response.answer_text: It is almost similar,all developed countries are advance in every field and some countries are not developed but advance in many field(example: india) Defination of developed countries. Developed economy is countries which meet with these criteria: High economic growth and also high GDP per capitaMust have high human development indexHigh sustainable growth or we can say people must be more aware about environment concernsTo meet these criteria country must have advance technology, advance infrastructure, advance in innovation, ideology should not be radical, must be good governance which provide liberty and equality. Country to become developed it must be advanced in every field Developed country is advance in every field but some country is advance in particular Field
